show.title: The Old Man Returns
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://kukufm.com/show/the-old-man-returns-1/?utm_source=share_sh
show.description: A retired corporate head running a pancake stall, Chen Wei, faces misunderstandings with his daughter and He Feifei after an injury incident, but through twists and turns, they eventually reconcile.
show.description_secondary: A retired corporate head running a pancake stall, Chen Wei, faces misunderstandings with his daughter and He Feifei after an injury incident, but through twists and turns, they eventually reconcile.
